carrier_bjectives.descreption: After I successfully finished college, I carried on learning a programming language that was Java SE. I learned it in my spare time after I went home from my sales representative job. I was dealing with Unity development in C_Sharp language as a hobby. In the beginning of this year I decided that I would learn a programming language that is useful for spectacular results, innovative and new. So I started to learn javascript and I found a school that can support practical deep knowledge and professional mentors. This school was the Coodecool.By now, I successfully finished the Codecool Intensive Junior Frontend developer course, where I had to implement 20 individual and team projects using the javascript language and frameworks.  I implemented these projects with the VS_Code editor using Vanilla.Js, React.Js, Node_Express.Js language tools. We regularly use our own backend REST_Api and call public APIs, from which we process data for the representation style, we use CSS and its framework SASS. During the training, I used Swiper, Firebase and Docker tools in terms of external libraries. In addition to the training, I conducted/completed additional training related to the topic in the Udemy system, which relates to React.js, Firebase/Google authentication, and Netlify storage. I finished the course in October 2022 with a successful final exam and certification. As a front_end developer, my goal is to participate in the development of spectacular and useful applications as a member of a team. My plan is to become a full stack developer and deeply know the backend part of web development

cerfitications.details: The fundamental scope of learning were HTML, CSS and Javascript in the first half of the education. In the second half on the learning path I learnt and mastered the usage of React js, Node_Express js, SASS, Firebase authentication and Cloud Storage.During this period there were individual and team projects that had to be managed as live projects. I acquire deep knowledge of Git and Github tools that were used in daily Meanwhile, I had to keep a clean coding policy. I received continuous mentoring support from professionals.The editor was VS Code and many other extensions and libraries

The motivation to take this online course was to gain deep knowledge of Javascript programming language, working of web browsers, HTML and CSS.During the training I managed to understand and use Vanilla Javascript for building dynamic ebsites. I used VS Code as editor for developing

In the pathway I managed to learn the key concepts and techniques of game development that are applied in large projects.I learned how to do profile optimization for managing performance issues.I used  Unity Visual Studio and C_Sharp language for developing

The scope was to understand and apply the mathematical calculations and techniques in game development.The main topics were transformation, translations, 3d vector calculations, matrix calculations  and quaternions.I used  Unity_Visual Studio and C_Sharp language for developing
The training topic was fundamentals of Java development language.I used Netbeans for implementing our codes
